pages.text:
Take Team-Building to the next level at Laguna’s.
There’s something for everyone to do.
Spend time out on the water aboard our double-decker catamaran, look out at the beach from above on the zip rails, or keep the fun on land and master the 3-story ropes course, 4o ft clip n’ climbs, or waterfront go-kart track.
DESIGNATED EVENT SPACE  |  EVENT PLANNING SUPPORT  |  ON-SITE FOOD & BEVERAGE  |  PACKAGE PRICING  |  ZIP RAILS  |  ROPES COURSES  |  CLIP ‘N CLIMB | GO KART RIDES  |  SPLASH PAD  |  PRIVATE CRUISES  |  JET SKIS  |  PARASAILS
WE’LL HELP YOU PLAN AN EXCITING DAY FOR YOUR TEAM FILLED WITH FUN, FOOD, DRINKS & ADVENTURE
From holiday parties and end-of-year celebrations to teambuilding activities and milestone occasions, Laguna’s is the perfect place to gather your employees together for a day filled with unforgettable memories.
Save your date, today!
Click below to get started.
Save Your Date
Start Planning your event

Celebrate at Laguna’s!
The Ultimate Spot for Birthday Fun & Family Celebrations all year long!
Planning a celebration the kids will never forget? Head over to
Laguna’s Beach Bar + Grill
on Pensacola Beach to host Birthday Bashes, Family Reunions, and Fun Days in the sun!
With plenty of space to spread out and play—from our
Adventure Park
and
waterfront go-kart track
to the
splash pad
,
ropes course
, and
zip rails
—kids, teens, and even adults will stay entertained for hours. Host your party in the
Longboard Hut.
Bring in decorations and bring your party theme to life.
Laguna’s is where memories are made—right on the beach
LOCATION AMENITIES
DESIGNATED EVENT SPACE | EVENT PLANNING SUPPORT | ON-SITE FOOD & BEVERAGE | PACKAGE PRICING | ZIP RAILS | ROPES COURSES | CLIP ‘N CLIMB | GO KART RIDES | SPLASH PAD
Birthday Package Details
Ultimate Adventure Park Party • $350
+ Taxes & Fees
$35 per kid - 10 minimum; $35 each additional kid
Park Pass 3hrs + 2 Pizza Slices per kid + Lemonade
Longboard Hut 3 hours with Party Host
(Park Passes are good for Ropes Course, Zip Rails (Scenic & Ropes), Go Karts, Splash Pad, Clip ‘n’ Climb activities)
Beach Access
Bring Your Own Dessert
Reserver Your Party Date
Planning a kid-friendly event?
Complete the inquiry form below to check availability and share preliminary details about you event plans.
Save Your Date
Save your date today and start planning your event today.
